entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, trying to save a small glass ball from being smashed. (Excerpt: 'Harry with his left arm held up in the air to try and save the small glass ball...')

entities.name: lucius malfoy
entities.description: A character who is trying to get a prophecy from Harry. (Excerpt: 'Lucius Malfoy’s voice in his ear, and Harry felt the tip of Malfoy’s wand pressing hard between his ribs.')

entities.name: neville
entities.description: A character who helps Harry by catching a small glass ball. (Excerpt: 'Neville spun himself around on his back and scooped the ball to his chest.')

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: A character who is dueling with Bellatrix. (Excerpt: 'Sirius and Bellatrix were now dueling')

entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: A character who is dueling with Sirius. (Excerpt: 'Sirius and Bellatrix were now dueling')

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: A character who jumps between Harry and Malfoy to protect them. (Excerpt: 'Lupin had jumped between them')

relationships.description: Lucius Malfoy is trying to get a prophecy from Harry, and is using his wand to press between Harry's ribs. (Excerpt: 'The prophecy, give me the prophecy, Potter!’ snarled Lucius Malfoy’s voice in his ear...')
Harry throws a small glass ball to Neville, who catches it. (Excerpt: 'No — get — off — me . . . Neville — catch it!’')
Lucius Malfoy points his wand at Neville after Harry throws the prophecy. (Excerpt: 'Malfoy pointed the wand instead at Neville...')
Harry uses his own wand to blast Lucius Malfoy off his back. (Excerpt: 'Harry jabbed his own wand back over his shoulder and yelled, “Impedimenta!”')
Lucius Malfoy smashes into the dais where Sirius is dueling with Bellatrix. (Excerpt: 'Malfoy aimed his wand at Harry and Neville again, but before he could draw breath to strike...')
Lupin jumps between Harry and Lucius Malfoy to protect them. (Excerpt: 'Lupin had jumped between them')
